name: Rotate puzzle pieces
description:
A simple mini-game in which you can relax and kill time waiting. The game is made in the genre of puzzles, in which you just need to click on a piece of the scene thereby rotating it 90 degrees clockwise. This should be done until the photos are collected on the main stage.
A large number of beautiful high-quality pictures and photos of landscapes, cities and animals.

Feature of game:
 - lots of beautiful pictures: landscapes, mountains, ponds, cities, animals, etc.
 - ability to select the size of the elements
 - convenient tips
 - the game develops attention
